title: Lammy hints at U-turn to allow Palestinian scholars to bring children to UK
summary: A group of students from Gaza, who have secured places at British universities, is expected to arrive in the UK within a few days. This influx aims to provide educational opportunities amid the ongoing crisis in the region. Their journey marks a significant effort to support students affected by turmoil in Gaza.

title: Keir Starmer set to announce UK recognition of Palestine later today - UK politics live
summary: An announcement from the Prime Minister is anticipated this afternoon, even amid strong objections from Israeli officials. The details of the announcement remain unclear, but it could have significant implications. Tensions are high as the political landscape evolves.
